sect1.para: ISO images are available for free under and other mirrors.
The following lists some of the many ways to obtain NetBSD on CD-ROM. If you offer one and would like it to be listed here, contact us.
The latest official release is NetBSD &release.latest;.

sect3.title: 5.0 - Linux System Labs
sect3.para: Linux System Labs offers the NetBSD 5.0 release on three multiarchitecture CDs. They're located in Australia, but will gladly ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 5.0 - OpenSource-ISO.de
sect3.para: OpenSource-ISO.de is a German vendor offering CD versions of NetBSD 5.0 (amd64 and i386). They ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 4.0.1 - Linux Central
sect3.para: Linux Central ships a 3 CD NetBSD 4.0.1 set.

sect3.title: 4.0 - CheepLinux
sect3.para: CheepLinux offers NetBSD 4.0 on CD. Orders dispatch before 3:30PM on the same day and ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 4.0 - Linux-Distro.co.uk
sect3.para: Linux Distro UK is selling NetBSD 4.0 for amd64, i386, and macppc platforms. The company is based in the UK but does offer cheap shipping to the rest of the world.

sect3.title: 4.0, 3,1 - Mensys BV
sect3.para: Mensys sells NetBSD 4.0/i386 and 3.1/i386 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: 3.1 - CheapISO.com
sect3.para: CheapISO.com distributes NetBSD 3.1 for i386 and amd64. They ship worldwide.

sect3.title: 3.1 - Maxtux.co.uk
sect3.para: maxtux.co.uk sells an i386 installation CD of NetBSD 3.1, and an accompanying binary package set.

sect3.title: 3.0 - linuxcenter.ru
sect3.para: LinuxCenter is selling NetBSD 3.0. Packages are also available on separate CD included in bundle. Company located in Russia.

sect3.title: Custom - Yong S. Yi: Release versions for all architectures
sect3.para: Yong S. Yi ysyi@async.org also produces custom CD's, including the release, binary packages, and documentation, for whatever architecture (or combination of architectures) is requested. Price is US $6.50, including shipping to any U.S. location.

sect3.title: Argentina - 3.0 - Silvio Riesco
sect3.para:
We sell a 2 cd set of NetBSD ($8) and send to all Argentina and Latin America. Visit
or email linux-cd@wguia.com for more information.

sect3.title: Brazil - 3.0 - Atuatech SuperStore
sect3.para: Atuatech SuperStore in Brazil sells NetBSD CD-ROMs for all ports. For details and inquiries, please contact compras-atuatech@atuatech.com.br, or visit .

sect3.title: Canada and USA - 5.0 - OS Dics by Mail (all ports)
sect3.para: OS Discs By Mail provides a "Download-Burn-Mail" service. They will download and burn any free operating system discs.

sect3.title: Canada - 4.0 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: CheapBytes offers a 3 CD multi-install set of NetBSD 4.0 which include release binaries for the i386, macppc, sparc64 and other platforms, as well as sets (2 CDs each) for i386 and amd64 containing the release binaries and source code.

sect3.title: France - 5.0 - Ikarios (i386, macppc, sources)
sect3.para: Ikarios offers NetBSD 4.0.1 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: France - 4.0 - getlinux
sect3.para: Getlinux offers NetBSD 4.0 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Germany - 5.0 Linux2go
sect3.para: German-based Linux2go offers NetBSD 5.0 (i386, amd64, multi-install CD set) and ships within Germany.

sect3.title: Germany/Europe - 4.0 Lehmanns Bookshop
sect3.para: German-based (and Europe-wide shipping) bookshop Lehmanns offers a NetBSD 4.0 4-CD-set.

sect3.title: Germany and EU - 4.0.1 - bsdiso - Software Service Ronald Brock
sect3.para: http://www.bsdiso.de/ offers 4.0.1 CDs for NetBSD/i386 as well as other platforms, shipping within the European Union from Germany.

sect3.title: Germany - 4.0 - ixsoft Softwareentwicklung
sect3.para: ixsoft Softwareentwicklung offers several 4.0 CDs for various platforms. See their site for more details.

sect3.title: India - 4.0 - LinuxBazar
sect3.para: offers a NetBSD/i386 4.0. They also ship to Bangladesh, Bhutan, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka.

sect3.title: Kazakhstan - 4.0 - linuxcenter.kz
sect3.para: LinuxCenter.KZ offers NetBSD 3.x and 4.x in the Republic of Kazakhstan.

sect3.title: Poland - 3.1 - e-systems
sect3.para: E-systems offers the latest stable version 3.1 of NetBSD/i386 on CD-ROM.

sect3.title: Russia - 4.0 - LinuxStudio.ru
sect3.para: LinuxStudio.ru offers NetBSD 4.0 on CD.

sect3.title: Russia - 4.0.1 - SourceLab
sect3.para: SourceLab.ru offers NetBSD 3.x and 4.x in Russian Federation.

sect3.title: Spain - 4.0.1 - Compralinux.com
sect3.para: Compralinux.com offers NetBSD 4.0.1 and older version multi-architecture and i386 specific CD-ROMs within Spain.

sect3.title: USA - 4.0 - CheapBytes (i386 only)
sect3.para: See CheapBytes.

sect3.title: Ukraine - 4.0.1 - Lafox.Net (amd64, i386)
sect3.para: Lafox.Net offers NetBSD 4.0.1 for i386 and amd64.

sect3.title: Official NetBSD ISO images
sect3.para: The list of NetBSD ISO download sites provides a list of sites worldwide where these official ISO images can be downloaded.
The iso directory on each mirror contains one image per port, and they are bootable on platforms that support booting from CD/DVD.
